issue.title: [CF 165] New Icon Type: Condition icon
issue.body:
This icon type will allow the user to specify a custom spell to use as a texture, custom texture path, or a solid color, for the sole purpose of displaying the status of conditions. This will allow users to create simple warnings based on the status of conditions, without having to create a cooldown icon that is set to always show to fake the behavior of what this icon type will do.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #165 | Raw
